**Make sure the issue is related to the Debian package or the German translation**
This fork is currently used for

 - adding files for creating a Debian package of EasyABC
 - improving the German translation of EasyABC

Please check that the issue is related to my changes in this repository.

 - Clone the upstream repository from https://github.com/jwdj/EasyABC/
 - Run `python3 easy_abc.py` from this sandbox.

If you see the same behaviour, then it is not related to my changes in bomm/EasyABC, and the issue should be reported in https://github.com/jwdj/EasyABC/issues
